title: Kimchi Jjigae
description: A classic Korean stew made with kimchi, tofu, and pork.
instructions: 1. In a pot, sauté pork belly until browned.
2. Add kimchi and cook for 5 minutes.
3. Pour in water and bring to a boil.
5. Add tofu and cook for 10 minutes.
6. Garnish with green onion and serve.

title: Bibimbap
description: A mixed rice dish with assorted vegetables, beef, and a fried egg.
instructions: 1. Marinate beef in soy sauce, sesame oil, and garlic.
3. Arrange rice, beef, and vegetables in a bowl.
4. Top with a fried egg and gochujang sauce.

title: Bulgogi
description: Thinly sliced marinated beef, grilled to perfection.
instructions: 1. In a bowl, combine soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, garlic, and pear to make the marinade.
2. Add beef to the marinade and let it sit for at least 30 minutes.
3. Grill or pan-fry the beef until cooked through.
4. Sauté onions and serve with the beef.
